In case you missed it last week, we just expanded our paid media (PPC) team. We have room for 3 or 4 new clients. Let me brag about this team for a minute:
- They maintain a 95% client retention rate by continually meeting and exceeding client goals
- Our E-commerce clients see an average year-over-year ROI increase of 20%
- B2C clients see an average year-over-year  increase of 141% in lead volume, 42% decrease in cost per lead!
- B2B clients see an average year-over-year increase of 357% in lead volume, 52% decrease in cost per lead!

Vertical Measures is a full-service digital marketing agency dedicated to helping clients drive profitable growth through content marketing. Based in Phoenix, Vertical Measures’ core specialties are technical search engine optimization, content marketing strategy, training and implementation, and profit-driven PPC management.NOTE: PLEASE DO NOT CONNECT WITH ME JUST TO SEND A SALES PITCH.

MediaChoice, Inc. is the premier provider of intelligent marketing information to the media and advertising industries. As an online market research company, businesses leveraged our marketing information, KnowledgeChoice, to pinpoint potential new advertising spots within an existing market, whether it be displaying complementary products on other companies' Web sites, strategizing product placement and announcements, predicting which products will beat the competition, or what might appeal to another company's demographics. Our technology assisted with search engine placement services for achieving top rankings.

Arnie joined as a Closing Keynote Speaker and Master Class Speaker at each of this years DIGIMARCON North America events held in Orlando, New York, Toronto and Santa Monica. Arnie’s presentation were top voted and the highlight at our events. Arnie is not just a veteran of his industry, but a pioneer. Arnie was at the forefront of the SEO and Content Marketing industry and brings a breadth of knowledge to the fields from tried and tested successful real-world applications from his clients. He knows where we've been, where we are and where we're going, what tactics work and which do not. As a speaker, he's dynamic, capable of handling any format, comfortable in any crowd. If the opportunity arises to work for him or with him - take it without question.

summary: Arnie Kuenn is an internationally recognized SEO and Content Marketing expert, speaker and author. He is the co-author of Content Marketing Works and author of Accelerate. Arnie speaks to and trains thousands of people every year all around the world. He has held executive positions in new technologies and marketing for more than 25 years.  In 2006, Arnie founded Vertical Measures, a highly respected SEO and Content Marketing agency. In 2008, he founded the Arizona Interactive Marketing Association (AZIMA). In 2014, he was honored as the Interactive Person of the Year in Arizona and in 2015 entered the Content Marketing Hall of Fame. Specialties: - Content Marketing- Search Engine Marketing (SEM)- Search Engine Optimization (SEO)- Social Media Marketing (SMM)
name: Arnie Kuenn
title: CEO at Vertical Measures, international speaker & author of Content Marketing Works: 8 Steps to Transform Your Business
